In the beginning I want to note that not all things will be interesting to you, but I think you\u2019ll find inspiration to do your own, and this is the goal of this post btw.
Not all following sheets created by me, and I\u2019ll mention this in their sections.`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:11,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:["There\u2019s a bunch of mobile apps to track your savings and expenses, I tried most of them, but any was customized as i want, so I found a great Money Tracking sheet that you have to give it a ",(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.a,{href:"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1l9l5JH4b9g7zqKTlylqWIhHnfWlBJzP2vqj9ET9K_Ok",children:"try from here."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:18,columnNumber:191},this)]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:18,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:["You may need to be updated about currency conversion to your local currency, or you may be interested in following metal prices like silver or gold, So instead of searching and memorize the prices, or getting another app, I created a 'cronjob' or a trigger to get the data I want, then update the target sheet. To do this, Google sheets Allows us to write scripts into sheets or any G-suite app, you\u2019re writing basically javascript with some additional helpers to access G-suite things in easy direct way, like access sheets with name, edit them, things like that, to know more about App Script ",(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.a,{href:"https://developers.google.com/apps-script",children:"click here"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:22,columnNumber:596},this),`.
Okay, what I\u2019ve done is adding a daily `,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:"USDtoEGP"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:23,columnNumber:40},this)," exchange rate to a sheet \u2014 Thanks to ",(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.a,{href:"https://support.google.com/docs/answer/3093281",children:"GOOGLEFINANCE"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:23,columnNumber:88},this)," \u2014 , and in another sheet page getting the price of gold daily \u2014 I\u2019ve not found a free api to do this so I scraped a website to work around this \u2014 in the next few lines I\u2019ll explain how to do this in a super easy few lines of ",(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:"gs"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:23,columnNumber:377},this)," code."]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:22,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-javascript",children:`function getUsdToEgpRate() {
  const spreedSheet = SpreadsheetApp.openById(<sheetID>).getSheetByName('usdtoegp');
  const today = new Date();
  const todayFormatted = \`\${today.getFullYear()}, \${today.getMonth() + 1}, \${today.getDate()}\`;
  const row = [
    today.toUTCString(),
    1,
    'USD',
    'Equals',
    \`=REGEXREPLACE(
      TO_TEXT(
        index(
          GOOGLEFINANCE(
            "CURRENCY:USDEGP", "price", date(\${todayFormatted})
            ), 2, 2
        )
      ), "\u066B", "."
    )\`,
    'EGP'
  ];
  spreedSheet.appendRow(row);
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:36,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:36,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:[`I want to say two things here:

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:["For the Metal tracker, As I told you before I didn't find a free solution to get an instant price for gold, So I created a little script using ",(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.a,{href:"https://github.com/puppeteer/puppeteer",children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:"puppeteer"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:72,columnNumber:145},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:72,columnNumber:144},this)," to scrape a website to get the data through api, then calling it in the script, and here's my final ",(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:"gs"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:72,columnNumber:298},this)," script:"]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:72,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.pre,{children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{className:"language-javascript",children:`function goldPrice() {
  const spreedSheet =
    SpreadsheetApp.openById("<sheetID>").getSheetByName("goldprice");
  const today = new Date();

  const response = UrlFetchApp.fetch("<API_ENDPOINT>");
  const price = JSON.parse(response.getContentText())["price"];

  const row = [today.toUTCString(), 1, "Gram", "Equals", price];
  spreedSheet.appendRow(row);
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:74,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:74,columnNumber:1},this),`
`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:["You may notice that in the code above i didn't write the scraping code, the reason that I've a repository to just handle like stuff in an external place, you can write it in your own way, BTW I used ",(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.a,{href:"http://heroku.com/",children:(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.code,{children:"Heroku"},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:88,columnNumber:201},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:88,columnNumber:200},this)," to deploy the scraping code that written in NodeJS."]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:88,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.p,{children:["Job tracking is another thing you may want to track in your life, you got the job or not, what was the offer, when you started, when you left, things like this will be cool to know what's your situation in your career, what're the campanies you know, ...etc. for this I found a ",(0,r.jsxDEV)(n.a,{href:"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eyJVRfGc5kGz5cfBYZpANosd4JRfWHc98BlD95Vsiog",children:"nice sheet to track this."},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:96,columnNumber:279},this),`
Also there's a tricks to do more, you can connect this sheet with your gmail, and add a new column to the emails recieved from the company, or what you want, But I'm using Gmail labels for kinda stuff.`]},void 0,!0,{fileName:"/Users/zeyadetman/Side Projects/blog-v5/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-525f0588-1cd6-46f8-ade0-78747ed4f1d1.mdx",lineNumber:96,columnNumber:1},this),`
